A

AuthorizationContext - class com.hippikon.security.AuthorizationContext.
The AuthorizationContext provides a placeholder for information retrieved after a user of a application has been authentication.
AuthorizationContext() - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.AuthorizationContext
 
accountID - Variable in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultAuthorizationContext
The account ID to which the user making the request belongs
addPermissions(PermissionSet) - Method in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
Adds a PermissionSet to affect the state of the PermissionSet instance using an OR rule.

B

Base64 - class com.hippikon.io.Base64.
Provides Base64 encoding/decoding routines as per RFC 1521.
Base64() - Constructor for class com.hippikon.io.Base64
 
base64Decrypt(String) - Static method in class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESStringEncryptor
Convenience method that decrypts a String that is base64 encoded from a byte array that was previously encrypted.
base64Encrypt(String) - Static method in class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESStringEncryptor
Convenience method that encrypts a String and then Base64 encodes to allow clients to handle as ASCII characters.

C

Configurable - interface com.hippikon.security.Configurable.
The Configurable interface forms part of the extensibility mechanism of the authorization framework and should be implemented by fine grained objects or aggregave view helper objects where creating an empty class just to inherit ProtectedResource becomes unwieldy.
ConfigurableProtectedResource - class com.hippikon.security.ConfigurableProtectedResource.
A default implementation of a Configurable class that is also a ProtectedResource and can be used within a List passed to the PermissionsFactory.
ConfigurableProtectedResource(String) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.ConfigurableProtectedResource
Create an instance of ConfigurableProtectedResource with the name used as the resource key in the policy-store definition.
canControl() - Method in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
 
canControl() - Method in interface com.hippikon.security.PermissionSet
Returns true if the CONTROL flag of the PermissionSet is enabled
canCreate() - Method in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
 
canCreate() - Method in interface com.hippikon.security.PermissionSet
Returns true if the CREATE flag of the PermissionSet is enabled
canDelete() - Method in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
 
canDelete() - Method in interface com.hippikon.security.PermissionSet
Returns true if the DELETE flag of the PermissionSet is enabled
canRead() - Method in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
 
canRead() - Method in interface com.hippikon.security.PermissionSet
Returns true if the READ flag of the PermissionSet is enabled
canWrite() - Method in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
 
canWrite() - Method in interface com.hippikon.security.PermissionSet
Returns true if the WRITE flag of the PermissionSet is enabled
com.hippikon.io - package com.hippikon.io
Contains utility I/O methods used to support the Hippikon pacakge, mainly regarding loading XML and Java property files.
com.hippikon.security - package com.hippikon.security
Hippikon is a powerful authorization API that was developed for enterprise software applications and is now provided free under Version 2.1 of the GNU LGPL.
com.hippikon.security.crypto - package com.hippikon.security.crypto
Contains utility classes to handle common encryption and decryption operations.
createDefaultPermissionSet(int) - Method in class com.hippikon.security.Policy
Returns a new DefaultPermissionSet instance that may be used by Policy subclasses in their doFinal() methods.
createMutablePermissionSet(PermissionSet) - Method in class com.hippikon.security.Policy
Returns a new MutablePermissionSet instance that may be used by Policy subclasses in their doFinal() methods.
ctx - Variable in class com.hippikon.security.Policy
The AuthorizationContext within which the client access to a ProtectedResource is being made

D

DESSecretKeyGenerator - class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESSecretKeyGenerator.
DESSecretKeyGenerator is a command line driven utility class that generates a SecretKey using DES strong encryption and persists in a key file specified as a command line argument.
DESSecretKeyGenerator(String, String) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESSecretKeyGenerator
Creates a new DESSecretKeyGenerator object using a specified password and filename to store the key as a seralized object.
DESSecretKeyGenerator(String) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESSecretKeyGenerator
Creates a new DESSecretKeyGenerator that will use the default password and seralize the SecretKey to the specified filename.
DESSecretKeyGenerator() - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESSecretKeyGenerator
Creates a new DESSecretKeyGenerator that uses the default password.
DESStringEncryptor - class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESStringEncryptor.
This class provides convenient String DES/CBC encryption/decryption operations using JCE extensions.
DefaultAuthorizationContext - class com.hippikon.security.DefaultAuthorizationContext.
The DefaultAuthorizationContext provides a default implementation of the AuthorizationContext interface.
DefaultAuthorizationContext() - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.DefaultAuthorizationContext
The default constructor required for subclassing
DefaultAuthorizationContext(String, String, List, String, List) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.DefaultAuthorizationContext
Creates a new DefaultAuthorizationContext object post-successful authentication.
DefaultAuthorizationContext(String, String, List, String, List, List) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.DefaultAuthorizationContext
Creates a new DefaultAuthorizationContext object post-successful authentication.
DefaultObjectPolicy - class com.hippikon.security.DefaultObjectPolicy.
The DefaultObjectPolicy class provides a mechanism to handle simple authorization based on the the roles assigned to a user.
DefaultObjectPolicy(ProtectedResource, AuthorizationContext) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.DefaultObjectPolicy
Creates a new DefaultObjectPolicy to handle simple authorization based on the roles the user has been assigned within a protected application.
DefaultPermissionSet - class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet.
The DefaultPermissionSet class provides a default implementation of the PermissionSet interface using bitwise operations to manipulate permission flags.
DefaultPermissionSet(int) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
Creates a new DefaultPermissionSet with initial int value
DefaultPermissionSet(String) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
Creates a new DefaultPermissionSet from a string representation of the ACL.
DefaultPermissionSet(PermissionSet) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
Creates a new DefaultPermissionSet object with values based on another PermissionSet object.
DefaultPermissionSet() - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.DefaultPermissionSet
Creates a new DefaultPermissionSet with no flags enabled.
decode(String) - Static method in class com.hippikon.io.Base64
Returns a base64 decoded byte array from a base64 encoded string.
decrypt(byte[]) - Method in class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESStringEncryptor
Returns a decrypted byte array given an encrypted byte array.
determineUserPrincipals() - Method in class com.hippikon.security.Policy
Returns a list of user principals to match with entries in a PolicyStore for a ProtectedResource This method should be implemented by specialized policies that need to apply user permissions based on their association with an ProtectedResource object.
doFinal(PermissionSet) - Method in class com.hippikon.security.Policy
Allows subclasses the opportunity to perform final logic on the PermissionSet before returning to the client.

E

Returns a base64 encoded String from a raw byte array
encrypt(String) - Method in class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESStringEncryptor
Returns an encrypted byte array of cipher text generated from the String provided as the method parameter.

I

IllegalAuthorizationException - exception com.hippikon.security.IllegalAuthorizationException.
Signals whether any access to a ProtectedResource is denied on the grounds that basic authorization data provided in the AuthorizationContext is either not present or invalid.
IllegalAuthorizationException(String) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.IllegalAuthorizationException
Creates a new IllegalAuthorizationException with descriptive error message

M

MutablePermissionSet - class com.hippikon.security.MutablePermissionSet.
The MutablePermissionSet class provides an implementation of the PermissionSet interface that may be manipulated by Policy implementations.
MutablePermissionSet(int) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.MutablePermissionSet
Creates a new MutablePermissionSet with initial int value.
MutablePermissionSet(String) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.MutablePermissionSet
Creates a new MutablePermissionSet instance with initial permissions value.
MutablePermissionSet(PermissionSet) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.MutablePermissionSet
Creates a new MutablePermissionSet with initial integer value based on the permissions of another PermissionSet object.
MutablePermissionSet() - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.MutablePermissionSet
Creates a new MutablePermissionSet with no flags enabled.

Creates a KeySpec from a given SecretKey.
makeDESKey(byte[], int) - Static method in class com.hippikon.security.crypto.DESSecretKeyGenerator
This method translates a KeySpec into a SecretKey.

P

PermissionSet - interface com.hippikon.security.PermissionSet.
The PermissionSet interface represents a set of flags (or an ACL entry) for a ProtectedResource.
PermissionsFactory - class com.hippikon.security.PermissionsFactory.
The PermissionsFactory class provides a convenient and simple mechanism for obtaining a PermissionSet for a ProtectedResource made by a user within an AuthorizationContext.
PermsNavigator - class com.hippikon.security.PermsNavigator.
PermsNavigator provides a Swing GUI that displays an XML Policy Store defined for an application.
Policy - class com.hippikon.security.Policy.
The Policy abstract class provides a simple mechanism for specializing security logic for a ProtectedResource at runtime.
Policy(ProtectedResource, AuthorizationContext) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.Policy
Creates a new Policy object to handle specialized permissions to be defined for a ProtectedResource within an AuthorizationContext.
PolicyStore - class com.hippikon.security.PolicyStore.
The PolicyStore represents a list of permissions defined for ProtectedResource objects hosted within a product.
PolicyStore() - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.PolicyStore
 
PolicyStoreLoadException - exception com.hippikon.security.PolicyStoreLoadException.
Signals that the PolicyStore could not be loaded for a ProtectedResource access within a AuthorizationContext.
PolicyStoreLoadException(String) - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.PolicyStoreLoadException
Creates a new PolicyStoreLoadException with a descriptive error message
ProtectedResource - class com.hippikon.security.ProtectedResource.
The ProtectedResource interface must be implemented by any object within an application that needs to have permissions based access enforcement that is handled by the Hippikon Authorization framework.
ProtectedResource() - Constructor for class com.hippikon.security.ProtectedResource
 
ProtectedResourceWrapper - class com.hippikon.security.ProtectedResourceWrapper.
This class is provided as a utility to find the overridden resource name of a ProtectedResource.
principals - Variable in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultAuthorizationContext
The complete list of principals determined at runtime
productID - Variable in class com.hippikon.security.DefaultAuthorizationContext
The product ID being accessed
